name: Config
info:
An input to this subflow will get the configuration to be saved to disk.

On startup, this node outputs the loaded configuration

name: Danger Zone (DO NOT TOUCH HERE UNLESS YOU KNOW WHAT YOU ARE DOING)

msg.payload={"tab":msg.topic};

command: free | grep Mem | awk '{print 100*($2-$7)/$2}' | awk '{print int($1+0.5)}' | tr -d "\n"
name: Free Memory

command: df -h | grep /dev/root | awk -F ' ' '{print $5}' | tr -d % | tr "\n$" "\ " |  sed 's/,/./' | tr -d " "
name: Disk Usage
fan.py
func:
#!/usr/bin/python
import smbus
import sys

state = msg["payload"]

bus = smbus.SMBus(1)

DEVICE_ADDRESS = 0x0d

if state == "off":
    bus.write_byte_data(DEVICE_ADDRESS, 0x08, 0x00)
    bus.write_byte_data(DEVICE_ADDRESS, 0x08, 0x00)
if state == "on":
    bus.write_byte_data(DEVICE_ADDRESS, 0x08, 0x01)
    bus.write_byte_data(DEVICE_ADDRESS, 0x08, 0x01)

name: action
func:
#!/usr/bin/python
import smbus
import time
bus = smbus.SMBus(1)
time.sleep(1)
#turn off fan RGB
bus.write_byte_data(0x0d, 0x07, 0x00)
bus.write_byte_data(0x0d, 0x07, 0x00)

#msg["payload"] = str(msg["topic"])+' now'
return msg

return msg;

name: pump.js
info:
### Focusing
##### focus.py `nb_step` `orientation`

- `nb_step` : **integer** (from 1 to 100000) - number of step to perform by the stage (about 31um/step)
- `orientation` : **string** - orientation of the focus either `up` or `down`

Example:

    python3.7 $HOME/PlanktonScope/scripts/focus.py 650 up

name: focus_distance
label: Distance in µm
tooltip: This will be rounded to the nearest 25µm

name: focus.js
round distance
round iso
Encapsulate settings
Shutter speed slider
label: Shutter Speed
tooltip: In microseconds, up to 2500µs, 10µs by default

name: Image control
info:
### Focusing
##### focus.py `nb_step` `orientation`

- `nb_step` : **integer** (from 1 to 100000) - number of step to perform by the stage (about 31um/step)
- `orientation` : **string** - orientation of the focus either `up` or `down`

Example:

    python3.7 $HOME/PlanktonScope/scripts/focus.py 650 up

name: Encapsulate config
func:
msg.payload = {
    "action":"update_config", 
    "config":{
        "sample_project":global.get("sample_project"),
        "sample_id":global.get("sample_id"),
        "sample_ship":global.get("sample_ship"),
        "sample_operator":global.get("sample_operator"),
        "sample_sampling_gear":global.get("sample_sampling_gear"),
        
        "acq_id":global.get("acq_id"),
        "acq_instrument":global.get("acq_instrument"),
        "acq_instrument_id":global.get("acq_instrument_id"),
        "acq_celltype":global.get("acq_celltype"),
        "acq_minimum_mesh":global.get("acq_minimum_mesh"),
        "acq_maximum_mesh":global.get("acq_maximum_mesh"),
        "acq_min_esd":global.get("acq_min_esd"),
        "acq_max_esd":global.get("acq_max_esd"),
        "acq_volume":global.get("acq_volume"),
        "acq_magnification":global.get("magnification"),
        "acq_fnumber_objective":global.get("acq_fnumber_objective"),
        "acq_camera_name":global.get("acq_camera_name"),
        "acq_nb_frame":global.get("nb_frame"),

        "object_date":global.get("object_date"),
        "object_time":global.get("object_time"),
        "object_lat":global.get("object_lat"),
        "object_lon":global.get("object_lon"),
        "object_depth_min":global.get("object_depth_min"),
        "object_depth_max":global.get("object_depth_max"),
        
        "process_pixel":global.get("process_pixel"),
        "process_id":global.get("process_id")
    }
};
return msg;

name: Get MachineName
func:
import sys
sys.path.append('/home/pi/PlanktonScope/scripts')
import planktoscope.uuidName

msg['payload'] = planktoscope.uuidName.machineName(machine=planktoscope.uuidName.getSerial())
msg['topic'] = "acq_instrument_id";
return msg

name: set global
func:
global.set(msg.topic,msg.payload);
return msg;

        "sample_project":global.get("sample_project"),
        "sample_id":global.get("sample_id"),
        "sample_ship":global.get("sample_ship"),
        "sample_operator":global.get("sample_operator"),
        "sample_sampling_gear":global.get("sample_sampling_gear"),
        
        
        "acq_id":global.get("acq_id"),
        "acq_instrument":global.get("acq_instrument"),
        "acq_instrument_id":global.get("machine_name"),
        "acq_celltype":global.get("acq_celltype"),
        "acq_minimum_mesh":global.get("acq_minimum_mesh"),
        "acq_maximum_mesh":global.get("acq_maximum_mesh"),
        "acq_min_esd":global.get("acq_min_esd"),
        "acq_max_esd":global.get("acq_max_esd"),
        "acq_volume":global.get("acq_volume"),
        "acq_magnification":global.get("magnification"),
        "acq_fnumber_objective":global.get("acq_fnumber_objective"),

        "custom_nb_frame":global.get("custom_nb_frame"),

        "pump_manual_volume":global.get("pump_manual_volume"),
};
return msg;

func:
var date = new Date(msg.payload);

global.set(msg.topic,date.toISOString().split('T')[0].replace(/-/gi, ''));

name: Convert DD to DMS
img_counter.js
func:
img_counter=global.get('img_counter')
img_counter=img_counter+1
global.set('img_counter',img_counter)
msg.payload = img_counter
return msg;

name: obj_counter.js
func:
obj_counter=global.get('obj_counter')
obj_counter=obj_counter+1
global.set('obj_counter',obj_counter)
msg.payload = obj_counter
return msg;

chart area

name: obj_counter init
func:
obj_counter=0
global.set('obj_counter',obj_counter)
msg.payload = obj_counter
return msg;

name: img_counter init
func:
img_counter=0
global.set('img_counter',img_counter)
msg.payload = img_counter
return msg;

name: percent image
func:
msg.payload = 100 * msg.payload/global.get('nb_frame')
return msg;
